Description:
To prepare and share the country growth strategic plan including customers, suppliers, and products for next three years within first quarter of joining.

.Ensure to follow QHSE policy, ERP processes and local company operations are regulated under the company and in line with legal compliances. Report everything to the management in case of any discrepancies.  Skills
